name: Mister Nothing
description:
Our first game, a simple platformer :)

You start with nothing,
collect coins to buy abilities at the shop

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • use the B button to buy at the shop
  • press space button to banana-dash
  • sometimes you have to die

Items:

  •  Get climbing shoes to climb on walls
  • Banana to banana-dash
  • Duck to swim

headless shopkeeper: "reincarnation doesn't mean you start with nothing"
